title: Claude Code Plugin Manifest
description: Schema for .claude-plugin/plugin.json files. See $comment for provenance.
$comment: Reverse-engineered from the Zod schema in @anthropic-ai/claude-code cli.js (v2.1.61). The plugin manifest schema is composed as: coreFields.extend(hooks.partial(), commands.partial(), agents.partial(), skills.partial(), outputStyles.partial(), mcpServers.partial(), lspServers.partial(), settings.partial()).strict() — 16 fields total, only name required.

name.description: Unique identifier for the plugin, used for namespacing (prefer kebab-case)

description.description: Brief, user-facing explanation of what the plugin provides

keywords.description: Tags for plugin discovery and categorization

hooks.description: Hook definitions or path to hooks JSON file

commands.description: Command definitions — relative path(s) or object map of command names to metadata

agents.description: Agent definitions — relative path(s) to agent markdown files

skills.description: Skill definitions — relative path(s) to skill directories

outputStyles.description: Output style definitions — relative path(s) to output style files

mcpServers.description: MCP server configurations — path(s), .mcpb/.dxt files, or inline definitions

lspServers.description: LSP server configurations — path(s) or inline definitions

settings.description: Settings to merge when plugin is enabled. Only allowlisted keys are kept (currently: agent)

name.description: Display name of the author or organization

url.description: Website, GitHub profile, or organization URL
